mapper.select: SELECT o.FG_ORDER_DATE, o.FG_ORDER_ID, p.FG_PICKUP_SCHEDULE, p.FG_PICKUP_COMPLETED,p.FG_PICKUP_REQUEST FROM FG_ORDER o JOIN FG_PICKUP p ON o.FG_ORDER_ID = p.FG_ORDER_ID

SELECT uf.FG_USER_FILE_ID, uf.FG_USER_FILE_ROOT, uf.FG_USER_FILE_NAME, uf.FG_USER_FILE_UUID, b.FG_BUSINESS_NAME, b.FG_BUSINESS_ADDRESS, b.FG_BUSINESS_ADDRESS_DETAIL, b.FG_BUSINESS_OPEN_TIME, b.FG_BUSINESS_PHONE FROM FG_USER_FILE uf JOIN FG_BUSINESS b ON uf.FG_USER_CODE = b.FG_USER_CODE

SELECT nu.FG_USER_CODE,pf.FG_PRODUCT_FILE_ID, pf.FG_PRODUCT_FILE_NAME, pf.FG_PRODUCT_FILE_UUID, pf.FG_PRODUCT_FILE_ROOT,p.FG_PRODUCT_NAME,p.FG_PRODUCT_EXP_DATE,p.FG_PRODUCT_WEIGHT, p.FG_PRODUCT_STOCK,p.FG_PRODUCT_PRICE FROM FG_PRODUCT p JOIN FG_PRODUCT_FILE pf ON p.FG_PRODUCT_ID = pf.FG_PRODUCT_ID JOIN FG_NORMAL_USER nu ON p.FG_BUSINESS_ID = nu.FG_USER_CODE WHERE nu.FG_USER_CODE = #{fgUserCode}
